title: New: Selebrities – Night Heat
content:
Premiered via our pals at Gorilla vs Bear, Selebrities new single Night Heat is a brooding, Cocteau Twins inspired number, proving wonderfully psychotic in parts. Sounding like it should be soundtracking a remake of an 80’s classic film, it’s dark and menacing in equal measures, yet tinged with a gloriously enticing pop edge. Night Heat is released 20 March via last years label sensation Cascine. Check out the track below, as well as a video produced by the bands very own Jer Robert.

Selebrities – Night Heat from Selebrities on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
